name: GKVoronoiNoiseSource
desc: A procedural noise generator whose output (also called Worley noise or cellular noise) divides space into discrete cells surrounding random seed points.

items.name: init(frequency: Double, displacement: Double, distanceEnabled: Bool, seed: Int32)
items.desc: Initializes a Voronoi noise source with the specified parameters.

items.name: class func voronoiNoise(withFrequency: Double, displacement: Double, distanceEnabled: Bool, seed: Int32) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a Voronoi noise source with the specified parameters.

items.name: var frequency: Double
items.desc: A value that determines the number and size of cells in generated noise.

items.name: var displacement: Double
items.desc: The range of random values to assign to each cell in generated noise.

items.name: var isDistanceEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether generated noise values incorporate the distance from each point to the nearest seed point.

items.name: var seed: Int32
items.desc: The value that determines the specific configuration of noise produced by the noise source.
